#summary Perl code examples for OpenHandle

[OpenHandleCodeExamples Code Examples]
== OpenHandle Perl Code Examples ==

Here's how a native Perl program (contained in file "`handler.pl`") can grab a handle data record:

{{{
% cat handler.pl
use LWP::Simple;

$OPENHANDLE = "http://nascent.nature.com/openhandle/handle";

$data = get($OPENHANDLE);

print $data;
}}}


{{{
% perl handler.pl 10.1038/nature05932
}}}
